adjectives.description: incrustate (comparative more incrustate, superlative most incrustate)

verbs.description: incrustate (third-person singular simple present incrustates, present participle incrustating, simple past and past participle incrustated)

examples: Now shou'd it happen that any of these Sun - like Bodies in the Centers of the several Vortices shou'd be so incrustated and weaken'd , as to be carried about in the Vortex of the true Sun
